settings.title: Booksio
settings.subtitle: WHERE EVERYDAY
settings.text:
Here at Booksio, each month we’ll highlight a specific charitable theme close to our hearts, and the highlighted organization(s) with the core mission to improve and address it. 10% of your sales will automatically go to making a difference towards our theme, so sit back, shop, and let us take care of the rest! If another cause or charity is dearer to your heart, just visit your account profile and pick a charity from our approved list.

Thank you for joining the Booksio community and making an impact on the world around you.

settings.title: November Charitable Theme
settings.subtitle: Food Insecurity
settings.text_1:
At Booksio, we are thankful for what we have, and we want to do what we can to make sure everyone has access to healthy food, a basic human right. We are committed to supporting local, national, and international organizations that reduce food insecurity, here and abroad.

During November, Booksio is proud to give 10% of all book and magazine sales to the following charities
settings.text_2:
FEEDING AMERICA- Feeding America believes no one in America should go hungry. This organization work to get nourishing food from farmers, manufacturers, and retailers to those in need while addressing the root causes of hunger.

CARE USA- A global organization, CARE works in over 100 countries, reaching more than 90 million people through 1,300 projects. Working with
settings.text_3: local NGOs, CARE empowers local communities through agricultural development and infrastructure projects to increase access to healthy, sustainable food and clean drinking water.Want to learn more about how food insecurity impacts communities and what you can do about it? Pick up some of these books and keep the learning going.

settings.title: Subscribe To Our Newsletter
settings.text:
Have you signed up yet? Subscribe to our newsletter and we’ll keep you up-to-date on all of your

favorite authors, charities, books and special promotions. So don’t wait, sign up today!
